metadata.title: CVE-2024-26945 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  crypto: iaa - Fix nr_cpus < nr_iaa case  If nr_cpus < nr_iaa, the calculated cpus_per_iaa will be 0, which causes a divide-by-0 in rebalance_wq_table().  Make sure cpus_per_iaa is 1 in that case, and also in the nr_iaa == 0 case, even though cpus_per_iaa is never used if nr_iaa == 0, for paranoia.
